$eref.description: Common properties and behavior across all STIX Domain Objects and STIX Relationship Objects.
$eref.title: core

___type.description: The type property identifies the type of STIX Object (SDO, Relationship Object, etc). The value of the type field MUST be one of the types defined by a STIX Object (e.g., indicator).
___type.title: type

___granular_markings.description: The set of granular markings that apply to this object.

___external_references.description: A list of external references which refers to non-STIX information.

___labels.description: The labels property specifies a set of terms used to describe this object.

___created.description: The created property represents the time at which the first version of this object was created. The timstamp value MUST be precise to the nearest millisecond.

___created_by_ref.description: The ID of the Source object that describes who created this object.

___lang.description: Identifies the language of the text content in this object.

___object_marking_refs.description: The list of marking-definition objects to be applied to this object.

___revoked.description: The revoked property indicates whether the object has been revoked.

___spec_version.description: The version of the STIX specification used to represent this object.

___modified.description: The modified property represents the time that this particular version of the object was modified. The timstamp value MUST be precise to the nearest millisecond.

___id.description: The id property universally and uniquely identifies this object.

___confidence.description: Identifies the confidence that the creator has in the correctness of their data.

___name.description: The name used to identify the Indicator.

___kill_chain_phases.description: The phases of the kill chain that this indicator detects.

$eref.description: The kill-chain-phase represents a phase in a kill chain.
$eref.title: kill-chain-phase

___phase_name.description: The name of the phase in the kill chain.

___kill_chain_name.description: The name of the kill chain.

$eref.description: Represents timestamps across the CTI specifications. The format is an RFC3339 timestamp, with a required timezone specification of 'Z'.
$eref.title: timestamp

___valid_from.description: The time from which this indicator should be considered valuable intelligence.

___description.description: A description that provides the recipient with context about this Indicator potentially including its purpose and its key characteristics.

___pattern_version.description: The version of the pattern that is used.

___type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `indicator`.

___indicator_types.description: This field is an Open Vocabulary that specifies the type of indicator. Open vocab - indicator-type-ov

___pattern_type.description: The type of pattern used in this indicator.

$eref.description: Represents timestamps across the CTI specifications. The format is an RFC3339 timestamp, with a required timezone specification of 'Z'.
$eref.title: timestamp

___valid_until.description: The time at which this indicator should no longer be considered valuable intelligence.

___pattern.description: The detection pattern for this indicator.

description: Indicators contain a pattern that can be used to detect suspicious or malicious cyber activity.
title: indicator
